Materiality Assessment, <IR> Capitals, Social & Relationship, Natural Manufactured, Human Intellectual, Financial

column7: The Group's list of material topics consists of social & relationship, naturally manufactured, human intellectual, and financial.

Mercury keeps updated with changes in these areas to consider how our approach needs to evolve to ensure we continue to create value. These insights are combined to form a view of what's material to our business.

column6: Direct economic value generated and distributed
column7: Mercury's FY2023 EBITDA is $841 million, up more than 40% on the prior year's $581 million. This record-high result reflects the ongoing benefits from the Tilt and Trustpower acquisitions made during FY2022, a full year of operations for the north section of Turitea windfarm and commissioning of the south section, as well as above-average hydro generation in a year of highly high inflows.
